name: Postal Plunge
description:
Submerge yourself beneath the waves, as you attempt to deliver a package to an unknown entity at the bottom of the ocean. Protect this cargo from vicious sea creatures, while you explore the depths of the sea before you. Be warned, one of these creatures is unlike the others, set apart by its aggression. Beware and good luck.

Your cargo is armed with a variety of handy dandy appliances that you will need to use to make it to your destination.

  • Teeth - Chomp Enemies On Your Left Side
  • 5G Cell Tower - Fry Enemies From A Distance Instantly
  • Machine Gun Rocket Launcher - Shoot Explosives That Deal Splash Damage
  • Bonker - Wack  Enemies On Your Left Side

If the game is too difficult or too easy, press escape and adjust the difficulty slider.

Good Luck! (Estimated Play Time: 5 Minutes)

Instructions are in-game.

Created for Ludum Dare 48 (Deeper and Deeper)
